name: Queen
text: On Play If your Leader has the (Animal Kingdom Pirates) type, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to 2 total [Plague Rounds] or [Ice Oni] and add them to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: If your Leader has the (Animal Kingdom Pirates) type, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to 2 total [Plague Rounds] or [Ice Oni] and add them to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in the bottom right corner. The card is marked as a sample.
